body_html: @Androbin I think you've hit the issue that stopped me after I had merged master branch. Gather_nd and scatter_nd stopped working with int64 declarations somewhere between tf.1.3 and tf1.4 versions. I can't figure out which of the CudaAtomic* kernels is causing the problem. Can you check if int32 compiles and it is int64 kernel missing?
